## types.Chunk type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Chunk<T extends any[], U extends number, ACC extends any[] = []> = ACC["length"] extends U ? [ACC, ...Chunk<T, U>] : T extends [infer F, ...infer RT] ? Chunk<RT, U, [...ACC, F]> : ACC["length"] extends 0 ? [] : [ACC];
```
